saao/saa15/P334258
a-na {LU₂}02-e EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-re-ṣi-u-a lu-u DI-mu ina EN-ia₂ a-ta-a be-li₂ qa-la ana-ku a-ki UR.KU a-sa-bu a-du-al-la 03 e-gir₂-a-ti ina UGU EN-ia₂ a-sa-par a-ta-a be-li₂ la i-ma-gur₂ gab-ru-u ša e-gir₂-te la u-še-ba-la ina UGU pi-qi-te-ia be-li₂ lu-sa-hi-ra-ni DUMU ša a-na AD-ka al-sa-mu-ni a-na ka-ša₂ u₂-ma-a la-al-su-mu a-ha-am-ma lu ma-me-ni be-li₂ a-ni-tu₂ le-pu-šu₂ u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig ina EN-ia₂ a-sa-par be-li₂ gab-ru-u ša e-gir₂-te ar₂-hiš lu-še-bil₂
